biotools.summary: This repository contains a software mvBIMBAM, a version of BIMBAM for multivariate association analysis, implementing a Bayesian approach for genetic association analysis of multiple related phenotypes.  We adapted source codes in BIMBAM to deal with multiple related phenotypes.

bioschemas.name: mvBIMBAM
bioschemas.summary: This repository contains a software mvBIMBAM, a version of BIMBAM for multivariate association analysis, implementing a Bayesian approach for genetic association analysis of multiple related phenotypes.  We adapted source codes in BIMBAM to deal with multiple related phenotypes.
